Key Match Events: Luis Suarez scored a dramatic stoppage-time equalizer
Ismael Kone scored an acrobatic overhead kick
Jonathan David pounced to slot home a rebound
Alphonso Davies hit the crossbar with a Panenka
Pre-Game Insights: Marcelo Bielsa said the tournament was “unprofessional”
Jesse Marsch claimed his side has been treated like “second-class” citizens
Post-Match Reflections: Canada should hold their heads high
Canada finished the highest of all the guest nations invited to compete at the U.S. Copa America
Miscellaneous Highlights: Luis Suarez came off the bench to level for Uruguay
Ismael Kone and Alphonso Davies both missed their penalties in the shootout
Others: Rodrigo Bentancur put Uruguay ahead with a sharp angled finish
Facundo Pellestri saw his first-half goal disallowed after a VAR review
